author: adminescalation
wldvr
description: Submit files to VirusTotal for analysis, check hashes from chat alone, and help stop users from sharing malware in your server. VirusTotal is a free online service that analyzes files and URLs to detect viruses, malware, and other security threats.
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed VirusTotal.
**Questions?** [We're listening](<https://www.beehive.systems/contact-us>)
**Interested in CyberSecurity and CyberSafety?** [Join our Discord](https://discord.gg/ckdzsm7mTs).

**IMPORTANT** - Before you can use this cog, you'll need to sign up for a VirusTotal account, then add your API Key to your Red instance.
name: VirusTotal
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores a temporary per-user submission history.
short: Check files using VirusTotal and an API key
